children.description: Content rendered inside the banner (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the banner

icon.description: Icon in the tile title (React component or element)

isDisabled.description: Flag indicating if the tile is disabled

isDisplayLarge.description: Flag indicating if the stacked tile icon is large

isSelected.description: Flag indicating if the tile is selected

isStacked.description: Flag indicating if the tile header is stacked
